thread.title: Pakistani ambassador affirms unwavering support for Iran in all situations
thread.title_full: Pakistani ambassador affirms unwavering support for Iran in all situations

author: Sher Muhammad
title: Pakistani ambassador affirms unwavering support for Iran in all situations
text: The Pakistani ambassador posted in Tehran, Mudassir Tipu, says that Pakistan has always stood with Iran in all situations, Bol News reported on Friday. Following the tension between Pakistan and Iran, there has been positive progress between the two countries, and the spokesperson for the Foreign Office (FO) has confirmed the positive exchanges between the two countries. After the attack by Iran in the area of Balochistan Panjgur, Muddassir Tipu, the ambassador posted in Tehran, was recalled and announced the expulsion of the Iranian ambassador from Pakistan. Pakistani Ambassador Mudassir Tippu reached the country on Thursday and issued a statement on social media platform X regarding the Iran-Pakistan recent tense situation. He said that in the complex regional environment, cooperation and mutual trust between the two brotherly countries are important for peace and stability. He further wrote on X that Pakistan is committed to its values of promoting peace, stability, and development.
